# Setup

```{r message=FALSE}
library(magrittr)
library(tidyverse)
library(glue)
library(arrow)
```


```{r}
batch <- params$batch
futile.logger::flog.info(glue("Batch = {batch}"))
```


```{r}
experiment <- as.data.frame(params$experiment)
```


```{r}
experiment_tag <-
  experiment %>%
  unite("experiment_tag", everything()) %>%
  pull("experiment_tag") %>%
  sort() %>%
  paste(collapse = "_")

futile.logger::flog.info(glue("Experiment tag = {experiment_tag}"))
```


```{r message=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(glue)
library(magrittr)
library(stringr)
library(tidyverse)
```

# Load 

```{r message=FALSE}
load_data <-
  read_csv(glue("{batch}/{batch}_{experiment_tag}_sample_images_metadata.csv"))
```
